trans-unit.source: Provides the data for the **RowUpdating** event of a .NET Framework data provider.
The `RowUpdating` event is typically raised just before an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to a row begins.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute when <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> is called.
The type of SQL statement to execute.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> object for an instance of this class.
This method allows implementations to perform type checking for the <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> object assignment.
Only valid <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> objects, for example a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object, should be permitted.
The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*> operation.
The <xref href="System.Data.IDbCommand"></xref> to execute during the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
Gets any errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> executes.
The errors generated by the .NET Framework data provider when the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> executes.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> that will be sent to the server as part of an insert, update, or delete operation.
The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> to send through an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
Gets the type of SQL statement to execute.
StatementType can be one of the following values: - Select - Insert - Update - Delete
The type of SQL statement to execute.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> of the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Command*> property.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.UpdateStatus"></xref> values.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Continue" name="Continue" href=""></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to send through the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update*>.
